rules_text:
Tap up to two target creatures and/or Vehicles. They don’t untap during their controller’s next untap step.
Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
